premises: The novel ends happily or tragically but not both at the same time
The novel does not end happily
conclusions: If the novel does not end tragically, it ends happily
incorrect conclusions: If the novel ends happily, it ends tragically
If the novel ends tragically, it ends happily

premises: The protagonist survives or perishes but not both at the same time
conclusions: If the protagonist does not perish, they survive
incorrect conclusions: If the protagonist survives, they perish
If the protagonist perishes, they survive

premises: The plot is comedic or dramatic but not both at the same time
conclusions: If the plot is not dramatic, it is comedic
incorrect conclusions: If the plot is comedic, it is dramatic
